author: bryanduxbury
msg: THRIFT-685. java: Direct buffer access to improve deserialization performance
This initial patch adds direct buffer access support to TDeserializer and TCompactProtocol, with the framework in place to be extended to other areas.

author: rajith
msg: Added a mechanism to catch the lexical cast errors and print an error message.
I also fixed up some formatting as well.
